comment: Барк на Патенте в Комнате Патента

languages.text: "Да будет известно, что волей моей и в соответствии с данным документом я нарекаю сего человека держателем Патента Вольного Торговца и возлагаю на него и его династию великую Миссию..."

traits.locale_text: "Да будет известно, что волей моей и в соответствии с данным документом я нарекаю сего человека держателем Патента Вольного Торговца и возлагаю на него и его династию великую Миссию..."

languages.text: "Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission..."
languages.original_text: "Да будет известно, что волей моей и в соответствии с данным документом я нарекаю сего человека держателем Патента Вольного Торговца и возлагаю на него и его династию великую Миссию..."

traits.locale_text: "Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission..."

"Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission.
To be the paragon of Humanity,
Unbroken by adversity,
To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To rise over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."

"Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission.
To be the paragon of Humanity,
Unbroken by adversity,
To walk bravely first into darkness,
To unite and reclaim what was lost,
To rise over nightmares untold,
To hold boldly the reins of fate,
To walk steadily the road of thorns,
Through pain to greatness."
"Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission..."

languages.text: “我再次明确声明，根据我的意愿与这份文件的真实内容，我任命此人为贸易授状的持有者，将我的王朝与伟大使命赋予此人……”
languages.original_text: "Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission..."

traits.locale_text: “我再次明确声明，根据我的意愿与这份文件的真实内容，我任命此人为贸易许可证的持有者，将我的王朝与伟大使命赋予此人……”

languages.text: «Que conste que por mi voluntad y por las palabras verdaderas escritas en este documento, nombro a esta persona portador{mf||a} de la Patente de Comercio, concediéndole a {mf|él|ella} y a su dinastía la gran misión...».
languages.original_text: "Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission..."

traits.locale_text: «Que conste que por mi voluntad y por las palabras verdaderas escritas en este documento, nombro a esta persona portador{mf||a} de la Patente de Comercio, concediéndole a {mf|él|ella} y a su dinastía la gran misión...».

languages.text: 「私の意志とこの文書の真の言葉によって、私はこの者を貿易令状の保持者に任命し、彼らとその王朝に偉大なる使命を与えると周知させよ…」
languages.original_text: "Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission..."

traits.locale_text: 「私の意志とこの文書の真の言葉によって、私はこの者を貿易令状の保持者に任命し、彼らとその王朝に偉大なる使命を与えると周知させよ…」

languages.text: "Es soll bekannt sein, dass ich durch meinen Willen und durch die wahren Worte dieser Urkunde diese Person zum Träger der Handelsvollmacht ernenne und ihr und ihrer Dynastie die große Mission erteile..."
languages.original_text: "Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission..."

traits.locale_text: "Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission..."

languages.text: « Que tous sachent que, par ma volonté et par les mots authentiques de ce document, j'accorde à cette personne la lettre de marque et lui octroie, ainsi qu'à sa dynastie, la grande mission... »
languages.original_text: "Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission..."

traits.locale_text: « Que tous sachent que, par ma volonté et par les mots authentiques de ce document, j'accorde à cette personne la lettre de marque et lui octroie, ainsi qu'à sa dynastie, la grande mission... »

languages.text: "Bilinsin ki bizzat irademle ve işbu belgenin hakiki sözleriyle bu şahsı Ticari Ruhsatname'nin hamili tayin eder, kendisine ve hanedanlığına yüce Misyon'u bahşederim. Bu uğurda..."
languages.original_text: "Let it be known, that by my will and by the true words of this document, I appoint this person to be the bearer of the Warrant of Trade, and bestow upon them and their dynasty the great Mission..."
